source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT E.SRC_EMPLOYEE_ID,E.SRC_FIRST_NAME,E.SRC_LAST_NAME,E.SRC_DEPARTMENT_ID,D.DEPARTMENT_NAME,D.MANAGER_ID,D.LOCATION_ID  FROM HR.TGT_EMP_DEPT_DT E
INNER JOIN HR.DEPARTMENTS D
ON E.SRC_DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID

text.value: @concat('update hr.DATALOAD set startdate =  ''',variables('StartDate'),''' ,enddate = ''',utcNow(),''' ,status = ''success'''''',source = ''',activity('Copy data1').output.rowsRead,''',target = ''',activity('Copy data1').output.rowsCopied,'''  where sourcetable = ''',item().sourcetable,'''')
@concat('update hr.config set status =''failed ''', 'where activeflag = 1 and status is null')

scripts.text: update  hr.config set status = null where activeflag =1

text.value: @concat('update hr.config set startdate =  ''',variables('StartDate'),''' ,enddate = ''',utcNow(),''' ,status = ''success'''''',source = ''',activity('Copy data1').output.rowsRead,''',target = ''',activity('Copy data1').output.rowsCopied,'''  where sourcetable = ''',item().sourcetable,'''')
